price: “O oče moj”, reče jedna od njih, “uzmi ga u najam, najbolje da unajmiš snažna i pouzdana.”
arabic: قَالَتۡ إِحۡدَىٰهُمَا يَٰٓأَبَتِ ٱسۡتَـٔۡجِرۡهُۖ إِنَّ خَيۡرَ مَنِ ٱسۡتَـٔۡجَرۡتَ ٱلۡقَوِيُّ ٱلۡأَمِينُ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qālat iḥ'dāhumā yāabati is'tajir'hu inna khayra mani is'tajarta al-qawiyu al-amīnu
